content.text: From the table above, find out the value of c

solution.text:
c = _{{trunc(Decimal(j)/Decimal(4), 2)}}_
\(\Rightarrow\) Since X and Y are inversely proportional XY = k
\(\Rightarrow\) Therefore, \(80 \times c = 10 \times a\)
\(\Rightarrow\) From previous subpart, \(a = 2 \times _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow c = \frac a8 = \frac {2 \times _{j}_}{4}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) c= _{{trunc(Decimal(j)/Decimal(4), 2)}}_
